question: How do you switch a sprite into multi-color mode?
answer: To switch a sprite into multi-color mode you must turn ON the VIC-II control register at location 53276 ($D01C).

question: What is the location of the VIC-II control register?
What is the POKE command to switch a sprite into multi-color mode?
What is the purpose of the POKE command in multi-color mode?
answer: To switch a sprite into multi-color mode

question: What is the condition to switch a sprite out of multi-color mode?
answer: To turn OFF the VIC-II control register at location 53276 ($D01C)
